price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka sε: “Sε mo na mowͻ me Wura Nyankopͻn Ahummͻborͻ akoradeε no ho tumi a, anka ehuu bεbͻ mo sε mobeyi (bi) ama; na (ampa sε) onipa yεm yε nyono.
arabic: قُل لَّوۡ أَنتُمۡ تَمۡلِكُونَ خَزَآئِنَ رَحۡمَةِ رَبِّيٓ إِذٗا لَّأَمۡسَكۡتُمۡ خَشۡيَةَ ٱلۡإِنفَاقِۚ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ قَتُورٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul law antum tamlikūna khazāina raḥmati rabbī idhan la-amsaktum khashyata al-infāqi wakāna al-insānu qatūran
